entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Deerwood
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
